author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ASML Holding Announces Q1 Operating Margin Of 28.1%
text:
April 18 (Reuters) - ASML Holding NV:
* Q1 NET SALES OF € 2,285 MILLION, NET SYSTEMS SALES VALUED AT € 1,668 MILLION, INSTALLED BASE MANAGEMENT SALES AT € 617 MILLION
* Q1 NET INCOME AS A PERCENTAGE OF NET SALES OF 23.6% * Q1 NET BOOKINGS OF € 2,442 MILLION, EXCLUDING HIGH-NA EUV ORDERS
* PROPOSED A DIVIDEND OF EUR 1.4 PER SHARE * SEES Q2 2018 NET SALES BETWEEN € 2.5 BILLION AND € 2.6 BILLION
* SEES Q2 GROSS MARGIN AROUND 43% * SEES Q2 RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT COSTS OF ABOUT € 375 MILLION
* 2018 TARGET EFFECTIVE ANNUALIZED TAX RATE IS AROUND 14 PERCENT
* SEES Q2 SG&A COSTS OF ABOUT € 115 MILLION Source text: bit.ly/2vjARcu Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
